title: Episode 100: Tesla Cybertruck Reactions, 5G vs Planes, and Q&A!
description:
It's our 100th episode! First Marques and Andrew have Adam on to unbox the YouTube plaques and react to the Tesla Cybertruck. Then they bring on David Imel for a 5G C-Band explainer and a Q&A. It's a fun one and a classic Waveform episode!

Links:
Tesla Cybertruck video: https://bit.ly/32E2z5b
